It is kneeling, his left calf is aligned horizontally, his right knee is separated at shoulder width from his left knee with his feet shoulder width apart with both elbows partly bent and both hands and his feet behind his back, his hands are further down than both hips, his knees are bent at near a 90 degree angle.
46.lhand_pose: Both thumbs are spread far apart while their left ring, their left thumb, their left middle, their left index and their left pinky are slightly bent while their right ring is slightly spread to other fingers .
46.rhand_pose: His right index, his right middle and his right ring are slightly bent with his right thumb and his right pinky bent.

47.body_pose: Their feet and both knees are about shoulder width apart with both knees in l-shape, their left calf is flat with both feet behind their back, their body is inclined forward. Their left hand is joined with their left knee while both elbows are partly bent.
47.lhand_pose: The left ring is near to other fingers and is a bit bent, the left middle, the left pinky, the left thumb and the left index are barely bent, the thumbs are spread far apart and both middles and the indexs are beside other fingers with the right ring slightly apart from other fingers .
47.rhand_pose: Their right pinky is partly bent while their right middle, their right thumb, their right index and their right ring are bent slightly.

48.body_pose: Both calves are parallel to the ground with both elbows rather bent with the right hand at the same level as the right knee and the feet and the hands backwards with the knees bent at near a 90 degree angle and both hands below both hips while the body is bent forward and both knees and the feet are shoulder width apart.
48.lhand_pose: The left ring is nearly bent and close to other fingers and the left middle, the left index, the left pinky and the left thumb are slightly bent while the right ring is slightly apart from other fingers while the thumbs are wide apart.
48.rhand_pose: The right thumb and the right pinky are rather bent and the right index, the right middle and the right ring are nearly bent.
